text.div:
ColorectalCancerTumourType

This code indicates the type of the colorectal tumour. A single selection value list from WHO Classification of Tumours. Pathology and Genetics of Tumours of the Digestive System (2010).

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    35917007Adenocarcinoma, no subtype
    32913002Medullary carcinoma
    450895005Micropapillary carcinoma
    72495009Mucinous adenocarcinoma
    450948005Serrated adenocarcinoma
    87737001Signet ring cell carcinoma
    59367005Adenosquamous carcinoma
    65692009Spindle cell carcinoma
    28899001Squamous cell carcinoma
    38549000Carcinoma, undifferentiated
